info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 7:02PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Carbon County through 745 PM MDT... At 701 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Joliet, or 16 miles southeast of Columbus, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail, along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Roberts and Boyd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
